event.title: Soon after painting
event.description:
In order to make the laminated plywood more beautiful, we may need to know how to paint your ex. You can color ones Laminated MDF and Laminated particle board to match your style.







2

Pointï¼š


Preparing before painting

Steps to paint

Old paint



Planning before painting


l Weighty sandpaper

l Sanding appliance (optional)

l Safety equipment

l Primer

l Pulling

l Paint brush as well as paint roller

l Fresh cloth

l Solvent



Ways to paint


The primary step – surface stone dust
The most important idea to note is you have to wear a protective mask and goggles before sanding to ensure you don’t inhale wood chips or have dust in your eyes. Before painting, you need to sand the surface from the laminated plywood. Remove dust and debris from the board and sand that has a rough sandpaper. You may use a sander or a straightforward sandpaper. Then, wipe the surface which includes a clean cloth. The area is finely ground together with fine sandpaper.



The 2nd step – Clean this surface
Wipe the laminated plywood which includes a damp cloth. Be guaranteed to remove all dust particles and allow the panel to dry. This is usually more conducive to next use.



The third step – the necessary paperwork of primer
Although detonation is just not always necessary before art work wood, laminated plywood has to be painted first because the surface from the board is highly absorbent. The particular primer will saturate that laminated plywood, making the painted surface more durable and bonded. You can obtain pre-launched laminated plywood, but they may be more expensive. Depending on the kind of paint you choose, pick from oil-based or acrylic-based primers and then apply a primer that has a paint brush. If the particular surface is large, a paint roller may be used.



The forth step : Scrub laminated plywood and apply a second coat
After the primer has dried, the plate can be polished with 220 grit papers. Then apply a primer and allow it dry.



The fifth move – Apply paint along with sand
Apply a thin layer of paint to the board with a airbrush. Let the boards dry after which it gently sand them. Then, apply a layer with paint. Allow to dried up before touching or using laminated plywood for a different project.



The sixth step – Clean your brush
When you keep the brushes clean for that next time, clean these people and let them dried out. If you use oil-based color, use a solvent to clean the paint brush. If you paint with water, it is possible to wash the brush using soap and water.



Good old paint


Maybe you have used laminated plywood for quite a while, but you want to generate it look more beautiful, you can take it off and paint the item, which is the exact same effect.



First remove the laminated plywood having a screwdriver to work more proficiently. If there is some decoration for the laminated plywood, you can remove the decoration 1st to better paint intended for him.



laminated plywood must remove surface dust after which wipe it with a new damp cloth or a new soft sponge. Make sure the laminated plywood should be dry prior to continue working. Then use rough grit sandpaper and sander to take out the old paint. If you can find holes in the laminated plywood, create them with wood putty. Before the compound begins to harden, the putty is inserted on the hole with a putty knife and leveled using a putty knife. Most wooden putty products harden around 20 minutes. Allow the putty for you to dry completely for about 12 hours.



Use rough sandpaper again after finishing the previous work to eliminate any excess wood putty and also the primer on your surface. Apply the 1st primer, completely dry, stone dust with sandpaper, and apply the second primer. Usually, two layers of primer are sufficient with the laminated plywood. The final primer following on from the primer is completely dried. Start with a top corner and apply the 1st layer of paint. Use a smaller paint roller if you need to avoid visible brush swings. Use a small brush to hide areas that you can’t reach using the roller. Let the laminated plywood dried up overnight. After the paint seemingly dry, use a screwdriver for you to reinstall the laminated plywood.



Soon after painting, look at your laminated plywood, is it more integrated with all your style? You can additionally freely combine various fresh paint methods.
